DataElement.preferredName: Concomitant Performed Intervention or Procedure Sequence Identifier Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A number assigned to an activity (medication/measures/procedures) that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population that is following as a consequence.  This number is used to establish a serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a receurrent pattern.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Concomitant Performed Intervention or Procedure Sequence Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Concomitant; following as a consequence._Executed and carried through to completion._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population.  This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmnetal acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._Sequence; serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Concomitant; following as a consequence.:Executed and carried through to completion.:An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population.  This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmnetal acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Concepts.definition: Accessory, accompanying especially in a subordinate or incidental way, occurring or existing during the same period of time.
Executed and carried through to completion.

An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Property.preferredDefinition: Sequence; serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Sequence; serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Sequence; serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.:One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.
One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
